com.ephesoft.gxt.core.client

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.gxt.core.client.Controller
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BatchClassManagementSelectionController, BatchInstanceController, BatchListController, FolderManagementController, ReviewValidateSelectionController, SystemConfigController, UploadBatchController

    public abstract class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for the UI which manages the event bus and handles all the RPC services. Controller provides manager responsible for adding handlers to event sources and firing those handlers on passed in events
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft
    See Also:
    HandlerManager, DCMARemoteServiceAsync
